content:
TypedArray Class

In this Article

Represents a reflectable reference to the Array class. This class stores the element type of a typed array, but this class does not store data.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class TypedArray : System.Reflection.IReflect

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • TypedArray

Inherited Members

Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)

Constructors summary

TypedArray(IReflect,Int32)

Initializes a new instance of the TypedArray class.

Properties summary

UnderlyingSystemType

Gets the type of the TypedArray object.

Methods summary

Equals(Object)

Determines whether the specified typed array has the same element type and rank as the current typed array.
GetField(String,BindingFlags)

Gets a field of the Array class type that has the specified name.
GetFields(BindingFlags)

Gets an array of FieldInfo objects that correspond to all fields of the Array class type.
GetHashCode()

Serves as a hash function for the element type of the typed array.
GetMember(String,BindingFlags)

Gets an array of MemberInfo objects that correspond to all members of the Array class type that match a specified name.
GetMembers(BindingFlags)

Gets an array of MemberInfo objects that correspond to all members of the Array class type.
GetMethod(String,BindingFlags)

Gets a method of the Array class type that has the specified name.
GetMethod(String,BindingFlags,Binder,Type[],ParameterModifier[])

Gets a method of the Array class type that has the specified name by using the specified selection criteria.
GetMethods(BindingFlags)

Gets an array of MethodInfo objects that correspond to all methods of the Array class type.
GetProperties(BindingFlags)

Gets an array of PropertyInfo objects that correspond to all properties of the Array class type.
GetProperty(String,BindingFlags)

Gets a property of the Array class type that has the specified name.
GetProperty(String,BindingFlags,Binder,Type,Type[],ParameterModifier[])

Gets a property of the Array class type that has the specified name by using the specified selection criteria.
InvokeMember(String,BindingFlags,Binder,Object,Object[],ParameterModifier[],CultureInfo,String[])

Invokes the specified member of the element type or the Array class type.
ToString()

Returns a string that contains the element type of the typed array and the rank information.

Constructors

  • TypedArray(IReflect,Int32)

    Initializes a new instance of the TypedArray class.

    public TypedArray (System.Reflection.IReflect elementType, int rank);

    Parameters

    • elementType
      IReflect

      The element type of a typed array.

    • rank
      Int32

      The rank (number of dimensions) of the array.

Properties

  • UnderlyingSystemType

    Gets the type of the TypedArray object.

    public Type UnderlyingSystemType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      The type of the TypedArray object.

    Remarks

    This property gets the type of the TypedArray object itself, not the element type of the typed array.

Methods

  • Equals(Object)

    Determines whether the specified typed array has the same element type and rank as the current typed array.

    public override bool Equals (object obj);

    Parameters

    • obj
      System.Object

      The typed array to compare with the current typed array.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if obj has the same element type and rank as the current typed array; otherwise, false.

  • GetField(String,BindingFlags)

    Gets a field of the Array class type that has the specified name.

    public System.Reflection.FieldInfo GetField (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The name of the field to get.

    • bindingAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

    Returns

    • FieldInfo

      A field that has the specified name, if one is found; otherwise, null.

  • GetFields(BindingFlags)

    Gets an array of FieldInfo objects that correspond to all fields of the Array class type.

    public System.Reflection.FieldInfo[] GetFields (System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);

    Parameters

    • bindingAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

    Returns

    • FieldInfo[]

      An array of objects that contains all fields of the Array class type.

  • GetHashCode()

    Serves as a hash function for the element type of the typed array.

    public override int GetHashCode ();

    Returns

    • Int32

      A hash code for the current object.

  • GetMember(String,BindingFlags)

    Gets an array of MemberInfo objects that correspond to all members of the Array class type that match a specified name.

    public System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] GetMember (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The name of the member to search for.

    • bindingAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

    Returns

    • MemberInfo[]

      An array of objects that match the name argument.

  • GetMembers(BindingFlags)

    Gets an array of MemberInfo objects that correspond to all members of the Array class type.

    public System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] GetMembers (System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);

    Parameters

    • bindingAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

    Returns

    • MemberInfo[]

      An array of objects that contains all members of the Array class type.

  • GetMethod(String,BindingFlags)

    Gets a method of the Array class type that has the specified name.

    public System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetMethod (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The name of the method to get.

    • bindingAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

    Returns

    • MethodInfo

      A method that has the specified name, if one is found; otherwise, null.

  • GetMethod(String,BindingFlags,Binder,Type[],ParameterModifier[])

    Gets a method of the Array class type that has the specified name by using the specified selection criteria.

    public System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetMethod (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr, System.Reflection.Binder binder, Type[] types, System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[] modifiers);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The name of the method to get.

    • bindingAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

    • binder
      Binder

      An object that performs type conversion from actual argument type to formal argument type.

    • types
      Type[]

      The parameter types that are used to locate a matching method.

    • modifiers
      ParameterModifier[]

      An array of parameter modifiers that enable binding to work with parameter signatures in which the types have been modified.

    Returns

    • MethodInfo

      A method that has the specified name, if one is found; otherwise, null.

  • GetMethods(BindingFlags)

    Gets an array of MethodInfo objects that correspond to all methods of the Array class type.

    public System.Reflection.MethodInfo[] GetMethods (System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);

    Parameters

    • bindingAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

    Returns

    • MethodInfo[]

      An array of objects that contains all methods of the Array class type.

  • GetProperties(BindingFlags)

    Gets an array of PropertyInfo objects that correspond to all properties of the Array class type.

    public System.Reflection.PropertyInfo[] GetProperties (System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);

    Parameters

    • bindingAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

    Returns

    • PropertyInfo[]

      An array of objects that contains all properties of the Array class type.

  • GetProperty(String,BindingFlags)

    Gets a property of the Array class type that has the specified name.

    public System.Reflection.PropertyInfo GetProperty (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The name of the property to get.

    • bindingAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

    Returns

    • PropertyInfo

      A property that has the specified name, if one is found; otherwise, null.

  • GetProperty(String,BindingFlags,Binder,Type,Type[],ParameterModifier[])

    Gets a property of the Array class type that has the specified name by using the specified selection criteria.

    public System.Reflection.PropertyInfo GetProperty (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr, System.Reflection.Binder binder, Type returnType, Type[] types, System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[] modifiers);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The name of the property to get.

    • bindingAttr
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

    • binder
      Binder

      An object that performs type conversion from actual argument type to formal argument type.

    • returnType
      Type

      The type of the return value that the property must have.

    • types
      Type[]

      The index types of the property being searched for. Used for index properties, such as the indexer for a class.

    • modifiers
      ParameterModifier[]

      An array of parameter modifiers that enable binding to work with parameter signatures in which the types have been modified.

    Returns

    • PropertyInfo

      A property that has the specified name, if one is found; otherwise, null.

  • InvokeMember(String,BindingFlags,Binder,Object,Object[],ParameterModifier[],CultureInfo,String[])

    Invokes the specified member of the element type or the Array class type.

    public object InvokeMember (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags flags, System.Reflection.Binder binder, object target, object[] args, System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[] modifiers, System.Globalization.CultureInfo locale, string[] namedParameters);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The name of the member to invoke.

    • flags
      BindingFlags

      A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

    • binder
      Binder

      An object that performs type conversion from actual argument type to formal argument type.

    • target
      System.Object

      The object on which to invoke the member. This must be the current script object.

    • args
      Object[]

      An array of objects that contains the number, order, and type of the parameters of the member to be invoked. This is an empty array if there are no parameters.

    • modifiers
      ParameterModifier[]

      An array that has the same length as the args parameter. It represents the invoked member's argument attributes in the metadata.

    • locale
      CultureInfo

      Provides information about a specific culture or locale. Used to format numbers, dates, and strings correctly.

    • namedParameters
      String[]

      An array of parameters.

    Returns

    • System.Object

      The return value of the call to the member.

    Remarks

    This method can use late binding to invoke the member on the element type of the array.

  • ToString()

    Returns a string that contains the element type of the typed array and the rank information.

    public override string ToString ();

    Returns

    • String

      A string that contains the element type of the typed array and the rank information.
